name: Con-Man: Fan Visual Novel
description:
Con-Man: Fan Visual Novel

A quickly put together Visual Novel (fan fic) to celebrate Con Man completing it's funding goal. I love the idea of the web series and hope it goes far.

This is a free game, if you like you can donate some money but that's up to you.

I hope you enjoy this little game.

https://www.indiegogo.com/projects/con-man

Amazingly they got it 735% funded on April 10, 2015 with $3,156,299 USD total funds raised
